product_overview: Gamasa Properties is a modern real estate web application designed to facilitate seamless buying, selling, and renting of properties in Gamasa city. It connects property owners and potential buyers/renters through an intuitive, feature-rich platform utilizing advanced search, interactive maps, secure authentication, and comprehensive management tools.
core_goals: Provide a user-friendly platform for property search and discovery with advanced filtering options.
Enable property owners to list and manage their properties easily.
Facilitate communication between users and property agents/owners via an internal messaging system.
Ensure secure and smooth authentication and user profile management.
Offer real-time notifications to keep users informed about bookings, messages, and property statuses.
Provide administrative controls for user and property management to maintain platform quality.
key_features: Homepage with featured listings, search bar, and city highlights.
Advanced property search with filters by location, price, type, and amenities.
Interactive maps powered by Leaflet for property location visualization.
Detailed property pages with images, descriptions, amenities, and agent contact info.
User authentication system with secure sign-up and login using Supabase Auth.
Profile management for updating personal and contact information.
My Properties section for owners to list, edit, and manage their properties.
Multi-step Add Property form including photo uploads and location tagging.
Favorites system to save preferred properties for future viewing.
Internal messaging for communication between buyers/renters and property owners.
Real-time notifications on bookings, messages, and listing updates.
Bookings management for rental and reservation handling.
Admin Dashboard providing platform statistics and management tools for users and listings.
user_flow_summary: Guest users can browse the homepage, search for properties using filters, view details, and upon interaction prompts, they must register or log in to contact owners.
Property owners log in to access adding properties through a multi-step form including uploading photos and submitting properties for review.
Authenticated users can browse listings, add properties to favorites, send messages, and manage their bookings.
Admins can monitor platform metrics and manage users and property listings to ensure compliance and quality.
validation_criteria: Homepage loads within 3 seconds and displays featured listings correctly.
Search results correctly filter based on user-selected criteria and display accurate property information.
Map integration correctly displays property locations with responsive markers.
Authentication flow supports smooth sign-up, login, and session management without errors.
Users can successfully create and update profiles with correct validation.
Property owners can add, edit, and submit property listings with image uploads functioning as intended.
Favorites correctly save and retrieve user selections persistently.
Messaging functionality delivers messages promptly with proper user permissions enforced.
Notifications arrive in real-time and reflect the latest booking and message statuses.
Bookings can be created, viewed, updated, and cancelled securely and reliably.
Admin dashboard accurately displays statistics and allows management of users and property listings with proper access controls.
